mapper.select: SELECT CompanyCode, DeptCode, RegionCode, JobPositionCode, JobTitleCode, JobLevelCode FROM covi_smart4j.sys_object_user_basegroup WHERE UserCode = #{userCode} AND CompanyCode = (SELECT DomainCode FROM covi_smart4j.sys_object_domain WHERE DomainID = #{domainID})
SELECT AccessUrlID AS AccessUrlID , URL AS URL FROM covi_smart4j.sys_access_url WHERE IsUse = 'Y'

SELECT DISTINCT GM.GroupCode FROM covi_smart4j.sys_object_group_member GM INNER JOIN covi_smart4j.sys_object_group G ON GM.GroupCode = G.GroupCode WHERE UserCode = #{userCode} AND G.CompanyCode IN (#{domainCode}, 'ORGROOT') AND G.GroupType NOT IN ('Dept', 'JobLevel', 'JobPosition', 'JobTitle')

SELECT AclID , ObjectID , ObjectType , AclList FROM covi_smart4j.sys_object_acl
INNER JOIN covi_smart4j.portal pt on pt.BizSection = 'Portal' AND pt.PortalType!='License' AND pt.IsUse = 'Y' and pt.PortalID = ObjectID
INNER JOIN sys_object_menu mn on mn.IsUse = 'Y' and mn.IsDisplay = 'Y' and mn.MenuID = ObjectID
WHERE ObjectType = #{objectType} AND SubjectType = 'UR' AND SubjectCode = #{userCode}

SELECT AclID , ObjectID , ObjectType , AclList , ( CASE WHEN SubjectType = 'CM' THEN '9' WHEN SubjectType = 'DEPT' THEN '2' ELSE '3' END ) AS AclPriority FROM covi_smart4j.sys_object_acl AS a INNER JOIN covi_smart4j.sys_object_group AS g ON a.SubjectCode = g.GroupCode INNER JOIN covi_smart4j.sys_object_group_type AS gt ON gt.GroupType = g.GroupType
INNER JOIN covi_smart4j.portal pt on pt.BizSection = 'Portal' AND pt.PortalType!='License' AND pt.IsUse = 'Y' and pt.PortalID = ObjectID
WHERE a.ObjectType = #{objectType}
ORDER BY AclPriority DESC, Priority DESC, GroupPath ASC, AclID DESC

SELECT b.InitPortal ObjectID , 'PT' ObjectType , '_____V_' AclList FROM covi_smart4j.sys_object_user a LEFT JOIN sys_license b ON a.LicSeq = b.LicSeq INNER JOIN portal pt on pt.PortalType='Business' and pt.IsUse = 'Y' and pt.PortalID = b.InitPortal WHERE userCode = #{userCode}

SELECT AclID , ObjectID , A.ObjectType , AclList , F.ObjectType AS BizSection FROM covi_smart4j.sys_object_acl AS a INNER JOIN covi_smart4j.sys_object_folder F ON A.ObjectID = F.FolderID WHERE a.ObjectType = 'FD' AND a.SubjectType = 'UR' AND a.SubjectCode = #{userCode}
AND F.ObjectType = #{serviceType}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO covi_smart4j.sys_object_acl (ObjectID, ObjectType, SubjectCode, SubjectType, AclList, Security, `Create`, `Delete`, `Modify`, `Execute`, `View`, `Read`, Description, RegisterCode, RegistDate, InheritedObjectID, IsSubInclude) VALUES (#{objectID},#{objectType},#{subjectCode},#{subjectType},#{aclList},#{security},#{create},#{delete},#{modify},#{execute},#{view},#{read},#{description},#{registerCode},now(3),#{inheritedObjectID}, #{isSubInclude})

INSERT INTO covi_smart4j.sys_object_acl (ObjectID, ObjectType, SubjectCode, SubjectType, AclList, Security, `Create`, `Delete`, `Modify`, `Execute`, `View`, `Read`, Description, RegisterCode, RegistDate, InheritedObjectID, IsSubInclude) SELECT #{objectID} , ObjectType , A.SubjectCode , A.SubjectType , AclList , Security , `Create` , `Delete` , `Modify` , `Execute` , `View` , `Read` , Description , #{registerCode} , now(3) , CASE WHEN ObjectType = 'FD' THEN (SELECT MemberOf FROM covi_smart4j.sys_object_folder WHERE FolderID = #{objectID}) WHEN ObjectType = 'MN' THEN (SELECT MemberOf FROM covi_smart4j.sys_object_menu WHERE MenuID = #{objectID}) ELSE 0 END , IsSubInclude FROM covi_smart4j.sys_object_acl A LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT SubjectCode, SubjectType FROM covi_smart4j.sys_object_acl WHERE ObjectID = #{objectID} AND InheritedObjectID = 0 ) B ON A.SubjectCode = B.SubjectCode AND A.SubjectType = B.SubjectType WHERE A.ObjectID = #{inheritedObjectID} AND A.ObjectType = #{objectType} AND B.SubjectCode IS NULL

INSERT INTO covi_smart4j.sys_object_acl(ObjectID,ObjectType,SubjectCode,SubjectType,AclList,`Security`, `Create`, `Delete`, `Modify`, `Execute`, `View`, `Read`, Description, RegisterCode, RegistDate) VALUES (#{objectID},#{objectType}, #{subjectCode}, #{subjectType}, #{aclList}, #{security}, #{create}, #{delete}, #{modify}, #{execute}, #{view}, #{read}, #{description}, #{registerCode},now(3));
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM covi_smart4j.sys_object_acl WHERE ObjectID = #{objectID} AND ObjectType = #{objectType}

DELETE FROM covi_smart4j.sys_object_acl WHERE 1=1
AND ObjectID IN (SELECT DISTINCT FolderID FROM (SELECT FolderID, CONCAT(';', FolderPath) AS FolderPath FROM covi_smart4j.sys_object_folder WHERE IsInherited = 'Y') A WHERE FolderPath LIKE CONCAT('%;', #{inheritedObjectID}, ';%')) AND IFNULL(InheritedObjectID, 0) != 0
AND ObjectID IN (SELECT DISTINCT MenuID FROM (SELECT MenuID, CONCAT(';', MenuPath) AS MenuPath FROM covi_smart4j.sys_object_menu WHERE IsInherited = 'Y') A WHERE MenuPath LIKE CONCAT('%;', #{inheritedObjectID}, ';%')) AND IFNULL(InheritedObjectID, 0) != 0
AND ObjectID = #{objectID} AND InheritedObjectID IS NOT NULL AND InheritedObjectID != 0
AND ObjectType = #{objectType}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.AclID , A.ObjectID , A.ObjectType , A.SubjectCode , A.SubjectType , A.AclList , A.Security , A.Create , A.Delete , A.Modify , A.Execute , A.View , A.Read , covi_smart4j.Fn_BaseGetDictionary_S(#{lang}, U.MultiDisplayName) AS SubjectName , U.MultiDisplayName AS MultiSubjectName , UB.CompanyCode , 'UR' AS GroupType , (SELECT SortKey FROM covi_smart4j.sys_object_group_type WHERE GroupType = 'UR') AS SortKey
, IFNULL(#{inheritedObjectID}, 0) AS InheritedObjectID
, IFNULL(A.InheritedObjectID, 0) AS InheritedObjectID
,IsSubInclude FROM covi_smart4j.sys_object_acl A INNER JOIN covi_smart4j.sys_object_user U ON A.SubjectCode = U.UserCode INNER JOIN covi_smart4j.sys_object_user_basegroup UB ON UB.UserCode = U.UserCode AND UB.JobType = 'Origin' WHERE A.ObjectType = #{objectType} AND A.ObjectID = #{objectID} AND A.SubjectType = 'UR'
UNION
SELECT A.AclID , A.ObjectID , A.ObjectType , A.SubjectCode , A.SubjectType , A.AclList , A.Security , A.Create , A.Delete , A.Modify , A.Execute , A.View , A.Read , covi_smart4j.Fn_BaseGetDictionary_S(#{lang}, G.MultiDisplayName) AS SubjectName , G.MultiDisplayName AS MultiSubjectName , G.CompanyCode , G.GroupType , GT.SortKey
, IFNULL(#{inheritedObjectID}, 0) AS InheritedObjectID
, IFNULL(A.InheritedObjectID, 0) AS InheritedObjectID
,IsSubInclude FROM covi_smart4j.sys_object_acl A INNER JOIN covi_smart4j.sys_object_group G ON A.SubjectCode = G.GroupCode INNER JOIN covi_smart4j.sys_object_group_type GT ON GT.GroupType = G.GroupType WHERE A.ObjectType = #{objectType} AND A.ObjectID = #{objectID} AND A.SubjectType != 'UR' ) A ORDER BY InheritedObjectID DESC, SortKey, SubjectName

SELECT '0' AS AclID ,'0' AS ObjectID ,#{objectType} AS ObjectType ,sog.GroupCode AS SubjectCode ,'CM' AS SubjectType ,'SCDMEVR' AS AclList ,'S' AS `Security` ,'C' AS `Create` ,'D' AS `Delete` ,'M' AS `Modify` ,'E' AS `Execute` ,'V' AS `View` ,'R' AS `Read` ,sog.DisplayName AS SubjectName ,sog.MultiDisplayName AS MultiSubjectName ,sog.CompanyCode AS CompanyCode ,sog.GroupType AS GroupType ,0 AS SortKey ,0 AS InheritedObjectID ,'Y' AS IsSubInclude FROM covi_smart4j.sys_object_group sog WHERE sog.GroupCode = #{companyCode}
